name: The Raven (Draft)
description:
NOTE: THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS.

A RAVEN?

You are a small raven at a mysterious shore. You're a little tired and disoriented, but that's alright. Luckily, you sort of recognise this place - this is where your nest should be. That's convenient.

- Waddle around and collect those cool shiny things on the ground

- Talk to the nice inanimate (?) statue lady and ask her for some gifts

- Wonder if this is what your grandparents meant when they talked about their hikes to school

CREDIT
